summary: Scammers are flooding Facebook with groups that purport to offer video streaming of funeral services for the recently deceased.  Friends and family who follow the links for the streaming services are then asked to cough up their credit card information.  Recently, these scammers have branched out into offering fake streaming services for nearly any kind of event advertised on Facebook...
title: Scam ‘Funeral Streaming’ Groups Thrive on Facebook
